data.name: Lonely Mountains: Downhill - Riley's Return
data.detailed_description:
Ride into uncharted territory and discover the lost trail of Mount Riley in this free DLC.

Features:
  • One trail with exciting challenges and two resting places awaits you
  • Gear up with new outfits, backpacks and paint job from the earth elemental set
  • Experience the beauty of Mount Riley on the all-new trail
  • Make a name for yourself on the leaderboard

Riley’s Return brings you a fresh adventure to the Lonely Mountains.
data.about_the_game:

data.short_description: Ride into uncharted territory and discover the lost trail of Mount Riley in this free DLC. Prove your skills in new challenges to unlock the brand-new earth elemental customization set Riley’s Return brings you a fresh adventure to the Lonely Mountains.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Polish, Turkish

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500 / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 560 Ti / AMD Radeon HD 7850
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: These specifications are subject to change.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4690 / AMD FX-8320
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 950 / AMD Radeon HD 7970 / R9 280X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: These specifications are subject to change.
